info.name: Immich Bridge
info.summary: Browse your Immich photo library from within Nextcloud
info.description:
Immich Bridge allows you to connect your Nextcloud instance to an Immich server. Browse albums and view photos directly from the Nextcloud interface.
Features: - Configure Immich connection (base URL + API key) - Browse albums - View thumbnails and original images - Read-only access (V1)
info.author: Immich Bridge Developer
